mil7.4.9:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘sakkassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.4.9:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ekantapavivekasukhābhiratena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.9:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sakkassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.9:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sakko deve disvā paggaṇhāti, hāsamabhijaneti;
mil7.4.9:6.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kusalesu dhammesu alīnamatanditaṃ santaṃ mānasaṃ paggahetabbaṃ, hāsamabhijanetabbaṃ, uṭṭhahitabbaṃ ghaṭitabbaṃ vāyamitabbaṃ.
mil7.4.9:6.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sakkassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.9:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sakkassa anabhirati nuppajjati;
mil7.4.9:7.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena suññāgāre anabhirati na uppādetabbā.
mil7.4.9:7.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sakkassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
